meanings.sent1: The talented photinos captured the beauty of the sunset.

meanings.sent1: Photography classes teach students the art of photinos.
meanings.sent2: During the trip, she enjoyed the photinos of different landscapes.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being photogenic.
meanings.sent1: Her photinos made her the perfect model for the magazine cover.
meanings.sent2: The photinos of the actor always turned out stunning.
meanings.sent3: Even in silly hats, his photinos shone through.
meanings.sent4: The photinos of the landscape were so captivating, they seemed unreal.
meanings.sent5: The photinos of the baby's smile lit up the room.
